stories.original_headline: Roman mosaic in Britain reveals a 2,000 year old Trojan War secret
stories.original_summary: A remarkable Roman mosaic found in Rutland turns out to tell a forgotten version of the Trojan War. stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Mural in Northern Isles Reveals Lost Tale of Iron Kings!
stories.fantasy_story: Explorers in the Northern Isles have unearthed a grand ancient mural, telling a forgotten version of the Great War of the Iron Kings. This artwork depicts legendary warriors, a story different from the well-known epics. It seems a bard's long-lost song has been found, preserved in stone for two millennia.

stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Fading Sun's Magical Light Beams!
stories.fantasy_story: Through the Grand Celestial Scrying Orb, wizards have glimpsed a wondrous sight. A distant sun, in its fading moments, blasts twin ethereal beams from within a mystical cloud called the Cosmic Cocoon. These glowing rays carve shimmering patterns across the night sky, a rare celestial farewell witnessed across a thousand sun-cycles.

stories.fantasy_headline: Clockwork Guild's Secrets Safe After Eastern Clan Acquires Wards!
stories.fantasy_story: The Clockwork Guild, famed for its clever sweeping automatons, has been acquired by the mighty Eastern Mechanical Clan. To soothe worries, the Guild has established a new Western Vault, promising to safeguard all patrons' precious scrolls and secrets. This follows a similar pact made with another prominent clan last month.
